content: @Zoya Khan how is your installation going?
Hi I am installing it on Windows 10

A command run by /srv/zulip/tools/provision.py failed; see output above.
==> default: Command was: python tools/setup/emoji_dump/build_emoji
@Zeeshan Qamar can you paste the full error output, not just the last line of it?

@Zeeshan Qamar Can you please confirm that you have followed Install Cygwin. Make sure to install default required packages along with git, curl, openssh, and rsync binaries. and installed the requiring binaries?
yes i am using Cygwin and have installed the required packages

==> default: subprocess.CalledProcessError: Command '['python', 'tools/setup/emoji_dump/build_emoji']' returned non-zero e xit status 1
The SSH command responded with a non-zero exit status. Vagrant
assumes that this means the command failed. The output for this command
should be in the log above. Please read the output to determine what
went wrong.
@Zeeshan Qamar Did you run Cygwin as an Administrator?
Zulip dev environment setup makes symlinks, which regular users on Windows do not have permission to do, so you have to run Cygwin as an administrator.
